info.name: InnoSystem - Complete API Collection
info.description: Comprehensive collection of all API endpoints available in the InnoSystem platform, including authentication, job management, runner health, billing, and more.

request.description:
Checks if the API service is up and running.

This endpoint requires no authentication and can be used for basic monitoring and health checks.

response.name: Healthy

request.description:
Get a list of all available job types.

Authorization required: Customer token

response.name: Job Types List

request.description:
Get details of a specific job type by ID.

Authorization required: Customer token

request.description:
Calculate the estimated cost for a job without creating it.

Authorization required: Customer token

response.name: Cost Calculation

request.description:
Mark a job as completed and provide results.
Usually called by runners but can also be used by authorized clients.

Authorization required: Customer token (job owner) or Runner token

response.name: Job Completed Successfully
response.body:
{
    "id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002",
    "status": "Completed",
    "updated_at": "2025-04-09T16:54:22Z",
    "actual_cost_cents": 425,
    "message": "Job completed successfully and customer billed 425 cents"
}

response.name: Job Failed
response.body:
{
    "id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002",
    "status": "Failed",
    "updated_at": "2025-04-09T16:54:22Z",
    "actual_cost_cents": 113,
    "message": "Job failed but customer still billed 113 cents (25% of estimated cost)"
}

Delete a project. Can only be done if there are no active jobs associated with the project.

Authorization required: Customer token (must be the owner of the project)

request.description:
Register a new runner in the system.

Authorization required: Reseller token

response.name: Runner Registered
response.body:
{
    "id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000010",
    "name": "Runner-GPU-01",
    "ip_address": "192.168.1.100",
    "status": "Active",
    "api_key": "runner_api_key_123456789",
    "metadata": {
        "os": "Ubuntu 22.04",
        "cpu": "AMD Ryzen 9 5950X",
        "gpu": "NVIDIA RTX 4090",
        "ram_gb": 64,
        "storage_gb": 2000
    },
    "compatible_job_types": [
        "Image Processing",
        "Video Transcoding",
        "Machine Learning Inference"
    ],
    "reseller_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
    "created_at": "2025-04-09T17:05:30Z",
    "updated_at": "2025-04-09T17:05:30Z",
    "last_heartbeat": "2025-04-09T17:05:30Z"
}

request.description:
Send a heartbeat from a runner to indicate it's still alive and to update its status.

Authorization required: Runner API key

Check the health status of a specific runner.

Authorization required: Admin token

response.name: Runner Health Status
response.body:
{
    "runner_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000010",
    "name": "Runner-GPU-01",
    "health_status": "Healthy",
    "last_heartbeat": "2025-04-09T17:10:15Z",
    "heartbeat_age_seconds": 45,
    "current_load": {
        "cpu_usage_percent": 35.2,
        "memory_usage_percent": 42.8,
        "gpu_usage_percent": 65.3,
        "disk_usage_percent": 68.1,
        "active_jobs": 2,
        "queued_jobs": 1
    },
    "active_jobs_count": 2,
    "total_jobs_processed": 145
}

request.description:
Check if a runner is compatible with a specific job type.

Authorization required: Admin token

response.name: Runner is Compatible
response.body:
{
    "runner_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000010",
    "runner_name": "Runner-GPU-01",
    "job_type_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
    "job_type_name": "Image Processing",
    "is_compatible": true,
    "reason": "Runner has 'Image Processing' in its compatible job types list"
}

response.name: Runner is Not Compatible
response.body:
{
    "runner_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000010",
    "runner_name": "Runner-GPU-01",
    "job_type_id": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000003",
    "job_type_name": "PDF Generation",
    "is_compatible": false,
    "reason": "Runner does not have 'PDF Generation' in its compatible job types list"
}
